title: How to create a wallet
excerpt: Step-by-step instructions to create a wallet.
body: To create a wallet, download the app or visit our website and follow the on-screen prompts. Keep your seed phrase private.

title: Protecting your seed phrase
excerpt: Best practices for storing your recovery phrase.
body: Never store your seed phrase online or share it. Use a hardware wallet for significant balances.

title: Account verification explained
excerpt: What to expect during KYC and verification.
body: Verification (KYC) helps keep the platform secure. You'll be asked for ID and proof of address.
